did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Older Persons' Records Project records and tape recordings, 1976-1979.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Interviews and reminiscences with senior citizens; also, organizational and administrative material associated with the project.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Interviews and reminiscences with senior citizens; also, organizational and administrative material associated with the project.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Older people -- New York (State) -- Tompkins County.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Tapes 693 side two, and 759 side two are restricted.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Older Persons' Records Project records and tape recordings, #3776. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Name and subject index for the collection: http://rmc.library.cornell.edu/EAD/pdf_guides/RMM03776.pdf
An additional list of the tapes can be found here starting on page 62: http://rmc.library.cornell.edu/EAD/pdf_guides/Tape_Recording_Inventory.pdf

scopecontent.p: Organizational files, forms filled out by participants, biographies, cassette tapes.
